testcase.name: Free CRM Create a new deal scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login Page for deals...............................passed When title of login page is Free CRM for deals..............................passed Then user enters username and password for deals............................passed Then user clicks on login button for deals..................................passed Then user is on home page for deals.........................................passed Then user moves to new deal page for deals..................................passed Then user enters deal details for deals.....................................passed Then Close the Browser for deals............................................passed
